meanings.definition: A person who uses something to bad effect or for a bad purpose.
meanings.sent1: The abusers of power caused harm to others.
meanings.sent2: The animal abusers were punished for their actions.
meanings.sent3: The abusers of the remote control kept changing the channels.
meanings.sent4: The abusers of trust shattered the fragile relationships.
meanings.sent5: The abusers of resources depleted them quickly.

meanings.definition: A person who treats someone with cruelty or violence, especially regularly or repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: The school bullies were known as the abusers among students.
meanings.sent2: The domestic abusers were arrested for their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The abusers of jokes always made others feel bad.
meanings.sent4: The abusers of kindness left scars on the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The abusers of rules faced consequences for their actions.

meanings.definition: A person who uses something in a way that it is not intended to be used.
meanings.sent1: The creative abusers turned old tires into swings.
meanings.sent2: The technology abusers hacked into the system.
meanings.sent3: The abusers of recipes added strange ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The abusers of tools found new uses for them.
meanings.sent5: The abusers of language created their own words.
